Title: Authorizes increased equity withdrawals by certain non-public residential health care facilities
Summary: Authorizes increased equity withdrawals by certain non-public residential health care facilities; establishes the nursing home worker recruitment and safety fund.
LawCode: Amd §§2808 & 2895-b, Pub Health L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to equity withdrawals by non-public residential health care facilities; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the nursing home worker recruitment and safety fund
